snippet: The fig may lack the pizazz of, say, the pomegranate for health-conscious consumers, and Nabisco’s campaign aims to shift the image of Newtons.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column highlights Kraft Foods' campaign for its Newtons' cookies and new fruit flavors.
lead_paragraph: The fig may lack the pizazz of, say, the pomegranate for health-conscious consumers, and Nabisco’s campaign aims to shift the image of Newtons.
